content.question: The situation depicted in the map had the most in common with which of the following earlier processes?

choices.label: Patterns of residential segregation in the antebellum South
Sectional conflict between the North and the South during the mid-nineteenth century
Federal attempts to guarantee rights for formerly enslaved people during Reconstruction
African American migration patterns during and after the First World War

content.answer: Federal attempts to guarantee rights for formerly enslaved people during Reconstruction

topic.text: 8.6: Early Steps in the Civil Rights Movement (1940s and 1950s)

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
